name: Ancient Foreast
description: The forest is full of temptations and traps, use your wits to travel through this ancient forest, and there will be unexpected rewards.

name: Dynamic avatar(Beta)
description: Each AWNS gives you access to special pieces and the ability to retool your NFT!

name: Dice
description: Simple and fun dice rolling game, complete 6 moves to get a bonus, good luck!

name: Eternal Legacy
description: Enter the realm of "Eternal Legacy," where the echoes of a fallen empire set the stage for a groundbreaking adventure. Challenge the guardians of mystical forces and embark on a quest where your tactical prowess, AI-enhanced gameplay, and NFT transformation and derivative ownership forge your path to glory.
